verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> [T'al-upon מָחֲלַ֗ת <S%H4257><s%> ma-cha-Lat, upon Mahalath מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <S%H4905><s%> mas-Kil Maschil לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. [A Psalm] of David אָ֘מַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar hath said נָבָ֣ל <S%H5036><s%> na-Val The fool בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <S%H3820><s%> be-lib-bo in his heart אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein There אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; [There is] no God הִֽ֝שְׁחִ֗יתוּ <S%H7843><s%> hish-Chi-tu, Corrupt וְהִֽתְעִ֥יבוּ <S%H8581><s%> ve-hit-'I-vu are they and have done abominable עָ֝֗וֶל <S%H5766><s%> 'A-vel, iniquity אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein is no עֹֽשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-seh- [there is] none that doeth טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> Tov. good

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Him, God מִשָּׁמַיִם֮ <S%H8064><s%> mish-sha-ma-Yim from heaven הִשְׁקִ֪יף <S%H8259><s%> hish-Kif looked down עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon בְּנֵ֫י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei upon the children אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of men לִ֭רְאוֹת <S%H7200><s%> Lir-'ot to see הֲיֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> ha-Yesh if there were מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <S%H7919><s%> mas-Kil; [any] that did understand דֹּ֝רֵ֗שׁ <S%H1875><s%> do-Resh, that did seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. God

כֻּלּ֥וֹ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lo Every סָג֮ <S%H5472><s%> sag Every one of them is gone back יַחְדָּ֪ו <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav they are altogether נֶ֫אֱלָ֥חוּ <S%H444><s%> ne-'e-La-chu become filthy אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein There עֹֽשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-seh- [there is] none that doeth ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov; good אֵ֝֗ין <S%H369><s%> 'Ein, is no גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- even אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. no not one

הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo no יָדְעוּ֮ <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'U no knowledge פֹּ֤עֲלֵ֫י <S%H6466><s%> po-'a-Lei Have the workers אָ֥וֶן <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven of iniquity אֹכְלֵ֣י <S%H398><s%> 'o-che-Lei ;who eat up עַ֭מִּי <S%H5971><s%> 'Am-mi my people אָ֣כְלוּ <S%H398><s%> 'A-che-lu [as] they eat לֶ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem; bread אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, upon God לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo no קָרָֽאוּ׃ <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra-'u. they have not called

שָׁ֤ם׀ <S%H8033><s%> sham There פָּֽחֲדוּ־ <S%H6342><s%> pa-cha-du- fear פַחַד֮ <S%H6343><s%> fa-Chad There were they in great לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no הָ֪יָה֫ <S%H1961><s%> ha-yah had been פָ֥חַד <S%H6343><s%> Fa-chad [where] no fear כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, was for God פִּ֭זַּר <S%H6340><s%> Piz-zar hath scattered עַצְמ֣וֹת <S%H6106><s%> atz-Mot the bones חֹנָ֑ךְ <S%H2583><s%> cho-Nach; of him that encampeth הֱ֝בִשֹׁ֗תָה <S%H954><s%> he-vi-Sho-tah, [against] thee thou hast put [them] to shame כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him because God מְאָסָֽם׃ <S%H3988><s%> me-'a-Sam. hath despised

מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi Oh יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten Oh that מִצִּיּוֹן֮ <S%H6726><s%> mitz-tzi-yOn [were come] out of Zion יְשֻׁע֪וֹת <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'ot the salvation יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> yis-Ra-'El of Israel בְּשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> be-Shuv bringeth back אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him When God שְׁב֣וּת <S%H7622><s%> she-Vut the captivity עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo; of his people יָגֵ֥ל <S%H1523><s%> ya-Gel shall rejoice יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, Jacob יִשְׂמַ֥ח <S%H8055><s%> yis-Mach shall be glad יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. [and] Israel
